{"cTime":"30 min","cuisine":"Italian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1587212526","images":["content://media/external/file/114123","content://media/external/file/114122","content://media/external/file/114132","content://media/external/file/114118"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Maida","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Capcicum","num":"0.5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Onion","num":"0.5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Corns","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Tomato ketchup","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Butter","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Garlic","num":"6","type":"piece"},{"ingredient":"Mozzarella cheese","num":"1","type":"cup"}],"notes":"","pTime":"20 min","procedure":["Take maida add little salt and make a dough and keep the dough aside for 30 mins","Pizza Sauce:
Hot the pan and add butter and chopped garlic in it, once everything melts add tomato ketchup in it","Assembling of Pizza:
Roll the dough and create pizza base
Put above pizza sauce, veggies and chhese on it

This is area to show your creativity üòÅ","Bake pizza for 20 Minutes on 180 degree in pre heated oven 

Once baked garnish with chilli flacks and origano

Serve it hot üçï"],"servings":"2","tags":["cheesey","Italian","thin crust","exotic"],"title":"Veggie Delight Pizza","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"25 min","cuisine":"Indian (Gujrati)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588019342","images":["content://media/external/file/114537","content://media/external/file/114534","content://media/external/file/114530","content://media/external/file/114535","content://media/external/file/114538"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Chana dal","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Tur dal","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Urad dal","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated Bottle guard","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated Carrot","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Gigner Paste","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Green chilli","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Curd","num":"2","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"ENO","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Musturd seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Curry leaves","num":"5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Seasame seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"06 hr","procedure":["Soak rice, chana dal, tur dal and urad dal overnight","Remove extra water from mixture and add curd in it and grid it","Add all veggies and powder masala in above mixture","Take a pan for seasoning add oil, musturd seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves allow to crackle","Add ENO in mixture it will be frothy mixture now, put that in Pan and cover it with lid and allow to cook on medium heat for 15 mins","Flip it and allow to cook on other side for 5 mins"],"servings":"4","tags":[],"title":"Indian Vegetables Lentil Cake (Handvo)","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian (Konkani)","desc":"Chef  : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588019946","images":["content://media/external/file/114311","content://media/external/file/114310"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Tomato","num":"2","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Coconut","num":"4","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Coriander seeds","num":"2","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Black paper seeds","num":"7","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Kashmiri red chilli","num":"4","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Tamarind","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Garlic","num":"2","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Ginger","num":"0.5","type":"piece"},{"ingredient":"Onion","num":"0.25","type":"piece"},{"ingredient":"Musturd seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Curry leaves","num":"5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Asofotida","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"05 min","procedure":["Grid all ingredients together and make thick paste out of it","Take a pan add oil and all seasoning items in it and then add above mixture add water to adjust consistency","Boil it for 10 minutes on medium high flame"],"servings":"4","tags":[],"title":"Tomato Saar","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588280018","images":["content://media/external/file/114465","content://media/external/file/114628","content://media/external/file/114635","content://media/external/file/114630","content://media/external/file/114629","content://media/external/file/114627"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Palak leaves","num":"12","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Imali and gud chutney","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Jira powder","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Coriander Powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"15 min","procedure":["Make thick paste of all dry ingredients add salt and water as per need, don\u0027t make flowy consistency","Wash all palak leaves and wipe out extra water from leaves","Spread besan\u0027s paste on leaves, wrap them and make a roll","Apply some oil on plate and keep this roll on that and steam it for 20 mins","Allow them to cool and cut it in small pieces, have it as is or you can shallow fry and enjoy them hot"],"servings":"2","tags":[],"title":"Palak Vadi","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"10 min","cuisine":"Indian (South Indian)","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588366054","images":["content://media/external/file/114731","content://media/external/file/114730","content://media/external/file/114731"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Mung Daal","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Fresh Coriander","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Garlic","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Ginger","num":"2","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Rice Flour","num":"2","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"01 hr","procedure":["Soak mung daal in hot water for 1 hour","Grind mung daal, fresh coriander, garlic, ginger, green chillies  and salt","Add rice flour in above mixture and add water to adjust consistency, it should not be flowy","Make dosa from above mixture and have it with tomato ketchup"],"servings":"10","tags":[],"title":"Mung Daal Dosa","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"10 min","cuisine":"Indian (Punjabi)","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588970983","images":["content://media/external/file/115059","content://media/external/file/115058"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Boiled Potato","num":"3","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Funnel seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cushed Coriander seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped Green chilli","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Chopped Ginger","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped garlic","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric powder","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Garam masala powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Aamchur Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Maida","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Carrom seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"2","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"20 min","procedure":["For outer cover of samosa

Take maida add salt to taste, carrom seeds and oil mix it well it should hold shape

Add water as per need and make a dough and keep it aside for 20 mins","Stuffing:-

Take a pan add oil in it, once the oil is hot add cumin seeds, funned seeds, coriander seeds once they will turn aromatic add ginger,garlic and green chillies in it

Now add smashed potatoes and all dry masala mix it well and allow to cook for 2 minutes","Filling :-

Roll a dough and make small puri out of it, cut it in between. Take one piece and connect diameter of circle and make a cone and fill the stuffing and cover other edge.","Baking of Samosa in oven:-

Arrange all samosa in baking tray put some oil on it and bake it in pre heated oven on 180 degree for 20 minutes","Baking of samosa in cooker:-

Remove rubber ring and whistle of cooker.

Take a cooker put some salt at base keep one stand at bottom, heat it for 5 mins on high flame

Put all samosa in cooker by applying little oil, be careful while doing this as cooker would be very hot.

Bake samosa for 20 mins, check in between if they are not turned golden brown cook them for more time.","Serve them hot along with chutney or tomato ketchup üòä"],"servings":"6","tags":[],"title":"Baked Samosa","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588972808","images":["content://media/external/file/115089","content://media/external/file/115090"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Half bunch of Palak","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Green peas","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cumin powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Ginger","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Garlic","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Green chilli","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Coriander powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Garam masala powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"15 min","procedure":["Clean palak thoroughly and blanch them (blanch-boil them in hot water for 5 minutes)\n\nOnce cooked drain hot water and wash it with cold water","Boil green peas","In mixer grinder add cooked palak, boiled peas, ginger, garlic, green chillies and make a paste don\u0027t make it flowy, it should be thick paste","Take a pan add  oil in it and add above mixture and all dry masala and cook well till it combines well","Once cooked allow to cool down and make small patty of this mixture and decorate it with cashew nuts","Take flat pan or tawa, put some little oil and arrange all patty on it and cook them on low flame for 5 minutes each side","Serve them hot with chutney or ketchup"],"servings":"8","tags":[],"title":"Harabhara Kabab","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian (South Indian)","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1588973778","images":["content://media/external/file/115091"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Urad dal","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Chopped onion","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Curry leaves","num":"5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Chopped Ginger","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped Green chillies","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"0.5","type":"L"}],"notes":"","pTime":"04 hr","procedure":["Soak urad dal for four hours or over night, drain excess water and grind it in mixer.\n\nDon\u0027t add extra water and making it flowy.","Add chopped onion, ginger, curry leaves and salt as per taste and whisk this mixture for 2 minutes","Take a kadhai add oil in it and keep flame on medium high.","Once oil is hot make medu vada. First wash your hand with water it will allow to release vada easily from hand so make sure your hands are wet when you make vada. To make vada take small portion in hand and make small hole in it and put that in oil.","Fry this till it turns ito golden brown color","Serve them hot with sambhar or chutney"],"servings":"12","tags":[],"title":"Medu Vada","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"30 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Vasanti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1588974239","images":["content://media/external/file/114690","content://media/external/file/114686","content://media/external/file/114688","content://media/external/file/114687"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Grated Gajar","num":"2","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Milk","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Milk powder","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped dry fruits","num":"4","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"1","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"20 min","procedure":["Clean gajar, peel the skin and grate them","Take a pan add ghee in it and grated gajar, cook it for 2 minutes","Now add milk in it and cover with lid and allow to cook for 10 minutes on medium flame","Now add milk powder in it and allow to condense all milk from mixture","At this stage add sugar in it and mix it well, keep mixing continuously once it will come together and leaves the pan add cardamom powder and chopped dry fruits in it."],"servings":"4","tags":[],"title":"Gajar Halwa","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"05 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1588976730","images":["content://media/external/file/115092"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Full fat curd","num":"250","type":"g"},{"ingredient":"Powdered Sugar","num":"5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Saffron threads","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped Pistachio","num":"3","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Cotton cloth","num":"","type":""}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Remove extra water from curd using cotton cothe. squeeze it and hang for 30 minutes.\n\nFor better result tie curd in cloth and keep it in fridge overnight","Take bowl add curd, sugar, cardamom, pistachio and saffron threads and mix it well","Shelf life is 3 days, need to be store in fridge or near cold place"],"servings":"4","tags":["dessert","maharashtrian"],"title":"Kesar Pista Shreekhand","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"30 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef : Sangita Khandekar","id":"1588977838","images":["content://media/external/file/115098","content://media/external/file/115104","content://media/external/file/115537","content://media/external/file/115534","content://media/external/file/115538"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"3","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"fresh/decicated coconut","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated jaggery","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Saffron threads","num":"11","type":"no."}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Ukad:-

Take a pan and add 1 cup of water, pinch of salt and 1 table spoon of ghee. Once boil comes add rice flour in it and mix it well. Turn off the gas and cover this mixture with lid for 20 minutes","Stuffing:-

Take a pan add ghee in it and then add jaggery once jaggery melts add coconut in it and mix it well. once everything melts and mix together add cardamom powder snd turn off the gas.

Don't overcook it otherwise it will be a chikki","Making of modak:-

First take small portion of ukad and give it a shape of bowl and pinch all sides and make a flower like shape

Now put stuffing in it and close all petals.","Steaming of Modak:-

Take a steamer if steamer is not there then take a big utensil like cooker bade and a strainer which will fit in it and water in it. 

Apply some ghee on strainer and deep modak in water before you place them on strainer. Put saffron threads on eash modak.

Once steam starts coming put this strainer in utensil and cover with lid and steam the modak for 15 minutes.","Serve it hot with lots of ghee"],"servings":"11","tags":[],"title":"Ukdiche Modak","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian (Gujrati)","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1588978479","images":["content://media/external/file/115095","content://media/external/file/115094","content://media/external/file/115120"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Boiled Potato","num":"3","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Imali Jaggery chutney","num":"8","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Dabeli Masala","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Sev","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Fresh Coriander","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Pomogranate","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Butter","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Masala peanuts","num":"","type":""}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["Stuffing:-

Take a pan add oil in it once oil is hot add dabeli masala in it, don't burn it

Add boiled smashed potato, salt and sugar little bit of water and mix it well, cook it for 5 minutes","Arranging Dabeli Plate:

Take a plate, spread potato bhaji on it. Decorate it with sev, Coriander, peanuts and pomogranate","Take a paav and cut in fron two side and make a pocket in it.

Spread imaly and jaggery chutney on it on both side and take a two spoons bhaji from above plat and spread over paav

Apply butter on both outer side of paav and roast it on tava on low flame for 5 minutes each side","Aapply some sev from outer side and serve it hot"],"servings":"4","tags":[],"title":"Dabeli","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef : Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1588978996","images":["content://media/external/file/115101"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"1.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Salt","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"2","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"05 min","procedure":["Take bowl add rice flour, water and salt and a make a lump free mixture it should be flowy consistency","Take a non stick pan, heat it on high flame once flames starts coming from pan. Take small portion of dosa batter and spread over tava, put very little oil on it and cover it for a minute","Flip it and cook other side too for a minute","It can be serve with coconut chutney or any sea food curry"],"servings":"6","tags":[],"title":"Ghavane/Neer Dosa","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1589048160","images":["content://media/external/file/115162"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Butter","num":"3","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Salt","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Coriander Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil for frying","num":"0.5","type":"L"}],"notes":"","pTime":"15 min","procedure":["Take a bowl and rice flour, besan, hot melted butter, salt, red chilli powder, coriander powder and cumin seeds mix it well, it should hold shape","After this add hot water as per need and make a stiff dough out of it","Make chakali by using piping bag or chakali mould.","Take a pan put oil in it and fry chakali on medium flame untill it turns golden brown","Once cool down store them in air tight container, they can be save untill 15 days"],"servings":"250","tags":[],"title":"Tukada Chakali","type":"gram"}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589048750","images":["content://media/external/file/115173","content://media/external/file/115171","content://media/external/file/115175","content://media/external/file/115169"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Maida","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Corn flour","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Baking soda","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"2","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Yellow colour (optional)","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"0.5","type":"L"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Saffron threads","num":"15","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Curd","num":"2","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["Sugar Syrup:
Take a pan add sugar and water in it, once sugar melts add cardamom powder and saffron in it and boil this for 5 minutes","Jalebi mixture:-

Take a bowl add maida, corn flower,curd and food color(optional) in it then add hot two spoons ghee mix it well. Now add water in it and adjust the consistency, it should be like a dosa batter. 

Make lump free mixture and add pinch of salt and mix it well.","Making of Jalebi:-

Take flat pan and add oil in it and 2 spoon of ghee.

Take a any plastic bag pour jalebi mixture in it and seal the end by rubber band it should look like cone.

Once the oil is hot cut the small edge of cone and make jalebi out of it in oil.

Once jalebi turns golden brown put them in medium hot sugar syrup and allow to soak for two minutes.","Decorate with pistachio (optional)"],"servings":"15","tags":[],"title":"Instant Jalebi","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian (Gujrati)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589050051","images":["content://media/external/file/115192","content://media/external/file/115167","content://media/external/file/115183"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Carrom seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Hot oil","num":"2","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Baking soda","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric powder","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"0.25","type":"L"}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["Take a bowl add besan, carrom seeds, baking soda and turmeric and mix it well","Then add hot oil in it and add water and make stiff  dough","Make small cylindrical shapes from dough. Take one piece place on flat wooden board and press from one end and drag to another end\n\nWith the help of knife take out fafada. Make sure knife in horizontal while detaching fafada from wooden board","Take a flat pan and add oil in it once oil is hot, fry fafada in it","Can be serve with chutney and fried green chillies"],"servings":"12","tags":[],"title":"Fafda","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian (Malvani)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589050509","images":["content://media/external/file/115193"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"3","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Ginger Garlic Paste","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Garama masala powder","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Coriander Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric Powder","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"King Prawns","num":"10","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"2","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Cleaning Of Prawns:

Take a prawns remove it's head and shell keep the tail and wash in thoroughly","Marination:

Put some salt and lemoj juice to prawns and keep it aside

Take a bowl add besan, rice flour, red chilli powder, giner garlic paste, garam masala powder, Coriander powder, turmeric powder and water and make a thick paste. Add prawns in this mixture and marinate it for atleast 30 minutes","Take a kadhai and add oil in it once oil is hot put prawns in it make sure they are well coated.

Fry them on medium high flame atleast for 7-8 minutes"],"servings":"2","tags":[],"title":"Prawns Koliwada","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589050941","images":["content://media/external/file/115194"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Chicken Leg Piece","num":"4","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Hung curd","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Ginger garlic paste","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Garam masala powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Coriander Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"04 hr","procedure":["Marinarion:-\n\nTake curn add all masala along with salt  and make a thick paste and marinate chicken in it overnight or atleast for 2 hours, marinate it in fridge","Take flat tava put some oil on it once oil is hot arrange chicken leg pieces on it and cover it with lid allow to cook for 5 minutes.","Now flip it and cook the other side","It\u0027s become soft once cooked, can be check with the help of knife.","Once cooked completely sprinkle some chat masala on it and serve it hot"],"servings":"2","tags":[],"title":"Chicken Drumsticks","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"30 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589053473","images":["content://media/external/file/115204"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Milk","num":"0.5","type":"L"},{"ingredient":"Milk powder","num":"250","type":"g"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"6","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Sitafal","num":"4","type":"no."}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Take out the custurd apple (sitafal pulp) and discard the seeds","Take a pan pour milk in it and allow it boil for 10 minutes now add milk powder in it, it will start reducing after 20 minutes and then add sugar and cook for 5 more minutes","Now allow it cool, once cooled completely add custurd apple pulp in it \n\nNOTE: don\u0027t add custurd apple pulp in hot milk it will spoil the milk, basundi might curdled"],"servings":"6","tags":[],"title":"Sitafal Basundi","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589140554","images":["content://media/external/file/115113"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Maida","num":"0.75","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"4","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Baking powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cloves","num":"12","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Almonds","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Lemon Juice","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"40 min","procedure":["Soak almonds in hot water for 30 minutes.

{"cTime":"40 min","cuisine":"Indian (Bengali)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589319552","images":["content://media/external/file/115352","content://media/external/file/115295"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Milk","num":"1","type":"L"},{"ingredient":"Lemon Juice","num":"3","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"2","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Milk Powder","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Milk","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"3","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom","num":"2","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Saffron thread","num":"12","type":"no."}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Take a pan put milk in it. Once milk boils add lemon juice in it. It will starts curdle. 

Once milk curdled completely milk fat and it's water content separates.

At this stage take cotton cloth and pour curdled milk in this. Wash curdled milk by adding water this will allow to get rid of lemon smell from milk to strain out extra water out of it.

Squeeze it little and hang it for 30 minutes.","Take this strained milk (chhaina) in a plate and knead it well unless everything comes together. Keep kneading atleast for 10 minutes.

Take small piece out of it and make cylindrical shapes","Take a pan add 2 cups of sugar and 4 cups of water. Add two cardamom. Take a pan add 4 spoons of milk in it and two spoons of ghee. Once boil comes add milk powder and 3 spoons of sugar in it and some saffron threads. Mix it well. Milk should get condensed. And it should start holding shape.

After some time it will start releasing from pan at this stage turn off the gas and take out malai in plate. Don't keep in pan it might burn.","Take cylindrical shaped cooked chhaina give a shallow cut on it and put malai in it. Garnish with Pistachio."],"servings":"10","tags":[],"title":"Malai Sandwich","type":"piece"}

{"cTime":"40 min","cuisine":"Baking","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1589320670","images":["content://media/external/file/115353"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Maida","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Powdered sugar","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Eggs","num":"2","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Butter","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Double cream","num":"150","type":"g"},{"ingredient":"Powdered Sugar","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Baking Powder","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Cocoa powder","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Grated Chocolate","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Vanilla extract","num":"1","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"01 hr","procedure":["Take a bowl add melted butter and sugar in it. If you are using whisker then it will take around 25-30 minutes.

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef: Vasanti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1591647591","images":["content://media/external/file/116527","content://media/external/file/116521","content://media/external/file/116515"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Boiled Potato","num":"3","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Chopped Green chillies","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Musturd seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped ginger","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Fresh Coriander","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped Garlic","num":"2","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Whole Garlic","num":"6","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Curry leave","num":"6","type":"no."}],"notes":"","pTime":"15 min","procedure":["Stuffing of Vada:

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Indian (Maharashtrian)","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1591648310","images":["content://media/external/file/116450"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Raw Mango","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Jaggery","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Cumin Powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Rock salt","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"00 min","procedure":["Peel skin of raw mango and cook them in cooker for 3 whistle.","Take out raw mango pulp, it will be around 1 cup.","Take mixer jar add raw mango pulp, grated 1 cup jaggery, roasted cumin powder, black salt and make a thick paste.

Kairi Panhe concentrate got created","Assembling of Panhe:-

Take two spoons for concentrated mixture, add cold water give a nice mixture. Adjust salt as per taste.

Strain the Panhe and serve it cold.","Shelf life for concentrated panhe is one year. Store it in fridge in air tight container."],"servings":"4","tags":["tangy","summerspecial","rawmangodrink","healthy"],"title":"Kairiche Panhe","type":"glass"}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1593778479","images":["content://media/external/file/117268"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Sevayan","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Milk","num":"2","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Chopped dry fruits","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"2","type":"cup"}],"notes":"","pTime":"","procedure":["Take a pan, put ghee in it once ghee melts add seviyan in it, roast them for 5 minutes on low flame","Now add milk in it and allow to boil, once milk is boiled add sugar in it and mix it well\n\nCook this mixture for 10 minutes","Once Seviyan are cooked switch off the flame and add cardamom powder and dry fruits","Serve it hot, if you keep them for sometime mixture will become thick, so you can add milk as per required consistency and heat the mixture"],"servings":"4","tags":["dessert"],"title":"Sivanya Kheer","type":"people"}

{"cTime":"10 min","cuisine":"Maharashtrian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1599244229","images":["content://media/external/images/media/120786","content://media/external/images/media/120791","content://media/external/images/media/120785","content://media/external/images/media/120790"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice Flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Rose essence","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Pink food color","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Salt to taste","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"2","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated wet coconut","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Jaggery","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"30 min","procedure":["Stuffing:-

Take a pan add 1 tsp of ghee, once ghee melts add coconut and grated jaggery in it, cook this mixture on low flame untill water evaporates.

Once water evaporated switch off the flame and add cardamom powder","For rose petals:-
Pink color rose flavoured dough:-
Take half cup water, add pinch of salt, rose color in a cooking pan and allow it to boil.

Once water boils add rose essence and half cup of rice flour and mix it well and cover with lid and keep it aside.

White dough:-
Take half cup water, add pinch of salt in a cooking pan and allow it to boil.

Once water boils add  half cup of rice flour and mix it well and cover with lid and keep it aside.

Afte 5-10 mins kned this dough with the help of little water and ghee and make smooth dough.

Note: kned both dough separately","Assembling of Gulab:-

take small portion of white dough, apply some dry rice flour and make thin roti with the help of rolling pin. With the help of cutter cut it to small circle shaped pieces.

Repeat the same for pink dough.

First take white small circle keep pink circle on it by overlapping little edges of both. Apply water inbetween to bind them.  Repeat this thrice to make a row of overlapped circle. So that total 6 circles will be utilised.

Cut ut diagonaly and rool along with it.

It will get shape of rose. With beautiful white and red petals.","Steame this roses in steamer for 10 mins.

At the end put stuffing in it and serve it beautiful healthy ukdiche gulab."],"servings":"15","tags":["traditionalDish","twistToSteamedModak","dessert","healthy","jaggery","riceflour"],"title":"Ukdiche Gulab","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Indian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1599244761","images":["content://media/external/images/media/121345","content://media/external/images/media/121346","content://media/external/images/media/121344"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"grated bottle gourd","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Wheat flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Red chilli powder","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Dhaniya Powder","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Jira Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Garam masala powder","num":"0.25","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["Take a bowl add grated bottle gourd, wheat flour, 2 tsp oil and all dry ingredients and salt as per taste.

Mix it well and keep it aside for 5-10 mins, bottle gourd will leave water.

Kned dough with it, if required add some water.","Take a smal portion of dough and flaten it on platform with the help of rolling pin.","Cook both the sides of paratha on medium high flame for 1-2 minutes. Apply ghee as per your taste.

Serve them hot with pickle or can be eat as is."],"servings":"7","tags":["healthy","breakfastItem","bottleGourd","wheat","ghee"],"title":"Bottle gourd paratha","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"10 min","cuisine":"Maharashtrian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1599245502","images":["content://media/external/images/media/120610","content://media/external/images/media/120604","content://media/external/images/media/120608"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Turmeric Leaves(medium)","num":"4","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated wet coconut","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated jaggery","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom powder","num":"1","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"2","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"20 min","procedure":["Stuffing:-

Take a pan add 1 tsp of ghee, once ghee melts add coconut and grated jaggery in it, cook this mixture on low flame untill water evaporates.

Once water evaporated switch off the flame and add cardamom powder","For Outer Cover:-

Take a bowl, add 1 cup of rice flour in it, pinch of salt and 0.5 cup of water and make thick paste","Take a turmeric leaf, cut it into small piece, size of leaf should be atleast 5-6 inches.

Apply ghee on it and spread rice flour evenly with the help of spoon. Put stuffing on it and close the leaf in inward direction, so that it will look like semicircle once it's steamed.","Steam this in steamer for 10-15 mins.

Serve them hot by putting ghee on it."],"servings":"8","tags":["healthy","dessert","madeItInTurmericLeaf"],"title":"Haldiche Patole","type":"no."}

{"cTime":"15 min","cuisine":"Maharashtrian Kokni food","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1599246156","images":["content://media/external/images/media/120614"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Coconut Milk","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Jaggery","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cardamom Powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["Undil:-

Take a bowl add half cup water and pinch of salt in it, allow it to boil. Once boiled switch off the flame and add rice flour and mix it well.

Cover with lid and keep it aside for 5-10 mins.

Now kned the dough with the help of water and make very small circular shap pieces of it.","Take a 0.5 cup of water and put all these pieces in this water and cook them untill water evaporates","Take another bowl add coconut milk in it, jaggery in it  and cardamom powder. make sure jaggery is completely melted in it.","Now add this milk in cooked rice balls and just warm the mixture.

Don't boil it otherwise coconut milk will we get curdled."],"servings":"4","tags":["healthy","coconutMilk","riceflour","jaggery","cardamom"],"title":"Undil Kheer","type":"bowl"}

{"cTime":"05 min","cuisine":"Maharashtrian","desc":"Chef : Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1599986819","images":["content://media/external/images/media/121569","content://media/external/images/media/121568"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Kokam","num":"0.5","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Grated coconut","num":"2","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Green chilli","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"1","type":"L"}],"notes":"","pTime":"20 min","procedure":["Take 1 cup boiled water and add kokam it in and keep it aside for 30 mins.

After 30 mins smash the kokam with hand and strain the extract in bowl","Take a mixer jar and add grated coconut, green chilli and cumin seeds, add 0.25 Ltr of water and grind the mixure.

Again add 0.25 ltr water of residue and grind it, squeez it and take out milk. 

Repeat this procedure two more times.","In this coconut milk, add kokam extract, salt to taste and chopped coriander leaves.","Can be serve chilled, goes well with fish üëç"],"servings":"4","tags":["coconutMilk","kokam","healthy","goesWithNonVegFood","richInVitaminC"],"title":"Sol Kadhi","type":"glass"}

{"cTime":"20 min","cuisine":"Gujrati","desc":"Chef: Vasanti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1602006212","images":["content://media/external/images/media/122240","content://media/external/images/media/122242","content://media/external/images/media/122238","content://media/external/images/media/122239","content://media/external/images/media/122237"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Sugar","num":"4","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Citric acid","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"Turmeric","num":"0.25","type":"tsp"},{"ingredient":"ENO","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Water","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Curry leaves","num":"5","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Oil","num":"4","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"15 min","procedure":["Take a bowl, add besan, 2 spoons sugar, 0.25 spoon citric acid, turmeric, salt to taste, water ans two spoons oil, and whisk it well.

Pour this batter in greased container.","And put it in steamer, and steam the dhokala for 25 minutes on high flame by covering lid.","For tempering:

Take a pan, add two spoons oil. once oil is hot add musturd seeds and curry leaves and allow it to crackle.

Then add two spoon sugar and one bowl water in it. once sugar is melted. Spread this tempring on dhokla pieces."],"servings":"12","tags":["snackItem","healthy","steamed","gujratidish"],"title":"Instant Dhokla","type":"piece"}

{"cTime":"01 hr","cuisine":"Maharashtrian","desc":"Chef: Jyoti Ajinkya Khandekar","id":"1602006883","images":["content://media/external/images/media/122081","content://media/external/images/media/122076","content://media/external/images/media/122080"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice","num":"2","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Jaggery grated","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Banana","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Ghee","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Ghee for frying","num":"","type":""},{"ingredient":"Khaskhas - popy seeds","num":"4","type":"tbsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"","procedure":["Wash rice and soak in water for 3 days

Change water on daily bases. otherwise it will stink","After 3 days, drain out all water and dry rice on cloth under fan for 3-4 hours

Don't dry it in sun","Now grind rice in mixer and make rice powder.

Sieve this through fine siever used for all purpose flour.","Take rice rice flour, add grated jaggery, banana in it and make a dough.

Don't add water,if required add little milk.","Now keep this dough in container which has lid for at least 2 days.","After two days knead the dough and take out small piece and make a flat shape like puri on palms.

Sprinkle some khaskhas on it.

Fry this in ghee on low flame. 

Don't flip it whike frying put ghee above it with the help of spatula.

Fry only one anarasa at the time.","Anarasa can be stored in air tight container for atleast 15 days

Dough can be stored uptp for 3 months."],"servings":"25","tags":["healthy","jaggery","fermenteddough","longestRecipe","5days"],"title":"Anarase","type":"piece"}

{"cTime":"25 min","cuisine":"Maharashtrian","desc":"Chef: Vasanti Ghanshyam Patekar","id":"1602007669","images":["content://media/external/images/media/121934","content://media/external/images/media/121935","content://media/external/images/media/121939"],"ingredients":[{"ingredient":"Rice flour","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Besan","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Jowar flour","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Wheat flour","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Urad Dal","num":"0.25","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Onion","num":"0.5","type":"gl"},{"ingredient":"Ginger","num":"1","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Garlic","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Coriander seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Funnel seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Ajwain","num":"0.25","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Methi seeds","num":"0.25","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Grated cucumber","num":"1","type":"cup"},{"ingredient":"Cumin seeds","num":"0.5","type":"tbsp"},{"ingredient":"Green chilli","num":"1","type":"no."},{"ingredient":"Turmeric powder","num":"0.5","type":"tsp"}],"notes":"","pTime":"10 min","procedure":["First take a pan add little oil in it, once oil is hot add cumin seeds  and onions and cook well.
